components.name: Accordion
components.description: A component that allows content to be collapsed and expanded in a vertical accordion style.

components.name: Bento Menu
components.description: A menu component inspired by bento box design, typically used for navigation or option selection.

components.name: Bottom bar
components.description: A bar or strip typically located at the bottom of the screen, often used for navigation or actions.

components.name: Breadcrumb
components.description: A navigational aid that shows the user's current location within a website or application.

components.name: Button
components.description: A clickable component used to trigger an action or submit a form.

components.name: Card
components.description: A component representing a card or box, commonly used to display information or content.

components.name: Carousel
components.description: A component that displays a series of content or images in a rotating carousel format.

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: A component used to select one or more options from a list of choices.

components.name: Comments
components.description: A component for displaying and interacting with user comments or feedback.

components.name: Date Picker
components.description: A component that allows users to select a date from a calendar interface.

components.name: Doner Menu
components.description: A menu component inspired by doner kebab menu design, typically used for navigation or option selection.

components.name: Dropdown
components.description: A component for selecting one option from a list that appears when activated.

components.name: Drop Down Button
components.description: A button component that opens a dropdown menu when clicked.

components.name: Drop Down Menu
components.description: A menu component that appears below a button or other control when clicked.

components.name: Feed
components.description: A component for displaying a list of content items in a feed or stream format.

components.name: Form
components.description: A component for collecting and submitting user input, typically consisting of input fields, checkboxes, and buttons.

components.name: Hamburger Menu
components.description: A menu component with a hamburger icon that expands to reveal navigation options when clicked.

components.name: Icon
components.description: A graphical symbol representing an object or concept, often used for visual communication.

components.name: Input Field / Text field
components.description: A component for users to enter text or data.

components.name: Kebab Menu
components.description: A menu component inspired by kebab menu design, typically used for navigation or option selection.

components.name: List Box
components.description: A component that displays a list of options with the ability to select one or more items.

components.name: Loader
components.description: A component that indicates to the user that content is loading or processing.

components.name: Meatballs Menu
components.description: A menu component inspired by meatballs menu design, typically used for navigation or option selection.

components.name: Mega Menu
components.description: A large dropdown menu with multiple columns of links and content, often used for complex navigation.

components.name: Menu
components.description: A list of options or commands presented to the user for selection.

components.name: Modal
components.description: A dialog box or popup window that appears on top of the main content to display additional information or actions.

components.name: Navigation Bar
components.description: A component that contains links or buttons for navigating between different pages or sections of a website or application.

components.name: Notification
components.description: A message or alert that informs the user about a system event or action.

components.name: Pagination
components.description: A component that divides content into separate pages, allowing users to navigate through them.

components.name: Picker
components.description: A component for selecting a value from a predefined set of options.

components.name: Progress Bar
components.description: A visual indicator that shows the progress of a task or process.

components.name: Radio Buttons
components.description: A set of buttons that allows the user to select only one option from a list of choices.

components.name: Scroll box
components.description: A container that allows users to scroll through content that is larger than the container's visible area.

components.name: Search Field
components.description: A component for users to enter search queries.

components.name: Sidebar
components.description: A vertical panel or column displayed at the side of a webpage or application.

components.name: Skeleton
components.description: A component that provides a temporary visual representation of content while it is loading.

components.name: Slider
components.description: A component for selecting a value from a range of values by dragging a slider handle.

components.name: Spinner
components.description: A rotating icon or image that indicates to the user that content is loading or processing.

components.name: Status Icon
components.description: An icon that represents the status of an object or process, such as success, warning, or error.

components.name: Stepper
components.description: A component that guides users through a multi-step process by breaking it down into sequential steps.

components.name: Tags and Chips
components.description: Small, interactive elements that represent keywords, categories, or other metadata.

components.name: Tab Bar
components.description: A component that displays tabs for navigating between different sections or views within an application.

components.name: Table
components.description: A grid-based component for displaying data in rows and columns.

components.name: Toast
components.description: A temporary, unobtrusive message that appears on the screen to provide feedback or information.

components.name: Toggle Switch
components.description: A component that allows users to toggle between two states, such as on/off or enabled/disabled.

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: A small pop-up box that appears when the user hovers over an element, providing additional information or context.
